snippet.title: Atari Arcade Hits: Volume 2
snippet.description:
***Best Viewed in Full Screen***

A look through Atari Arcade Hits: Volume 2, a compilation of six classic Atari arcade games for Windows PC. I tried to spend an adequate amount of time going through each arcade title in the package, as well as looking through some of the bonus materials the game offers such as arcade flyers, box & cartridge scans, artworks, and other historical pieces.

In 2001, Atari Arcade Hits: Volume 2 was combined with Volume 1 into a new compilation release called Atari Anniversary Edition, published by Infogrames. This particular version I own is the one packaged in Atari Anniversary Edition, which is why you can see a button in the main menu that directs to Volume 1. 

Played on Windows XP. Recorded with Camtasia Studio 8. 

Release: 2000  (later in 2001 with Volume 1 as Atari Anniversary Edition)

Developed by: Digital Eclipse
Published by: Hasbro Interactive (later Infogrames)


Atari Arcade Hits: Volume 2 ©2000 Atari Interactive Inc. Artworks, programs, & audiovisuals found in Atari Arcade Hits: Volume 2 are properties of Atari Interactive Inc. Battlezone © Rebellion Developments Limited. No copyright infringement intended.
